vsParam:
Hey, what's going on, [px]?
Why do you call me out... all of a sudden...
Everyone! Here comes the man of the hour!

President H-Hazel? And you guys are all here?
Wh-what's going on here?

What's going on... It's a farewell party of course.
A farewell party, for you!

Since you are already a "family member" of the Academy,
no matter which path you'll take, this relationship won't fade.

So... we decided to throw you a
big party for your new life.
... But, it's [px] who proposed this party.
Do we cause any trouble to you?
Sorry, I told others about your leaving.

No... No trouble at all!
I am very happy!

Don't apologize!
I am very happy!
This is a farewell gift for you.

This is... a smith's hammer?
You are giving this to me?

That's right. We hope that it can help with your work...
and reminds you of the Academy all the time.

This hammer contains the love and kindness from everyone
in the Academy for you, including [px].

Yeah.
I hope that you would treasure it.

Everyone! Everyone!
Thank you... Thank you!

Ah, don't cry!
We also prepared a lot of delicious food!

Of course. How about we enjoy it tonight?
And celebrate your new life... Alright?

Yeah! The Academy is the best!
[px] and you guys, thank you so much!
